chunks: Unity - Manual: The Select tool Manual Scripting API unity.com Version: Unity 6 (6000.0) Supported Legacy Language : English English 中文 日本語 한국어 Unity Manual Version: Unity 6 Select a different version Language : English English 中文 日本語 한국어 Working in Unity 2D in Unity Tilemaps in Unity Tile palettes Tile palette editor tools The Select tool Tile palette editor tools Select tiles with the Select tool The Select tool Use the Select tool to select tiles on the tilemap A GameObject that allows you to quickly create 2D levels using tiles and a grid overlay. More info See in Glossary , and use that selection with other Tile Palette editor tools such as the Move tool to move selected tiles. Page Description Select tiles with the Select tool Use the Select tool to select tiles and cells. Grid Selection properties reference Explore and understand the Grid Selection Inspector A Unity window that displays information about the currently selected GameObject, asset or project settings, allowing you

to inspect and edit the values. More info See in Glossary window properties. Modify Tilemap reference Explore and understand the Modify Tilemap section’s gizmos A graphic overlay associated with a GameObject in a Scene, and displayed in the Scene View. Built-in scene tools such as the move tool are Gizmos, and you can create custom Gizmos using textures or scripting. Some Gizmos are only drawn when the GameObject is selected, while other Gizmos are drawn by the Editor regardless of which GameObjects are selected. More info See in Glossary and their functions.
